IN RE the Termination of the Parent-Child Relationship of: E.H. (Minor Child); J.H. (Father), Appellant-Defendant,
v.
The Indiana Department of Child Services, Appellee-Plaintiff. Court of Appeals Case No. 49A02-1710-JT-2488 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED May 14, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

PYLE , J.

Affirmed.

VAIDIK, C.J., Concurs.

BARNES, J., Concurs.
